alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 2:43AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Crawford, northwestern Sebastian, southeastern Sequoyah and northern Le Flore Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 243 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles east of Sallisaw to 5 miles south of Gans to 2 miles southwest of Bokoshe. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Sallisaw... Poteau... Cedarville... Barling... Pocola... Muldrow... Roland... Spiro... Arkoma... Panama... Hackett... Bonanza... Bokoshe... Gans... Cameron... Moffett... Brushy... Fort Smith Regional Airport... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 8. Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 307 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
